#include<bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;

int re(int a) {
	int bas = 1;
	int ans = 0;
	while(a) {
		ans = (ans * 10) + a % 10;
		a /= 10;
	}
	return ans;
}

int main() {
	int t;
	cin>>t;
	while(t--) {
		int ans1,ans2;
		cin>>ans1>>ans2;

		int final_ans = re(ans1) + re(ans2);

		cout<<re(final_ans)<<"\n";
	}
	return 0;
}
